text: One Wild Moment (French title: Un moment d'égarement) is a 2015 French comedy- drama film directed by Jean-François Richet. It is a remake of the 1977 film Un moment d'égarement, directed by Claude Berri. The film was produced by Berri's son, Thomas Langmann, and Sébastien Delloye. ==Plot== Two divorced fathers, Antoine and Laurent, take Louna and Marie, daughters aged 17 and 18, on holiday in Corsica, where one of them finds himself seduced by the other's 17-year-old daughter. == Cast == * Vincent Cassel as Laurent * François Cluzet as Antoine * Alice Isaaz as Marie * as Louna * Annelise Hesme as Sylvie * Noémie Merlant as Linda * Philippe Nahon as Antoine's neighbor == See also == * Blame It on Rio - The American remake of Un moment d'égarement (1977) == References == == External links == * * Category:2015 films Category:2015 comedy-drama films Category:French-language films Category:French comedy-drama films Category:French films Category:French film remakes Category:Films directed by Jean-François Richet Category:Films about vacationing Category:Films set in Corsica Category:Films produced by Thomas Langmann
